VA Landscape Analysis (Return to Home)

As part of the VA landscape analysis we are spidering the va.gov domain looking for existing data sets that should be turned into APIs. Along the way we are learning a lot about how the data manages data and maintains it's web presence.

This is a snapshot of the data that has been targeted, processed, and identified as part of the VA landscape analysis, summary counts, visual tag clouds, listings, and the raw data behind.

  • All (4058278 targeted w/ 716346 processed) (Tag Cloud) (Tag List)
  • Subdomains (278) (Tag Cloud) (Domain List)
  • CSV (387) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • JSON (342) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • XML (1759) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • XLS (3645) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • Table (5111) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • Data.gov (519) (Tag Cloud) (Tag Listing) (URLs)
  • Suggested (Listing)
  • Process (Overview)

The data behind all of this is available as JSON files in the Github repository for the project, and will be updated daily as we continue spidering the site.
